code: import React,{useRef,useEffect}from'react';import{Link,useNavigate,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import'./header.scss';import logo from'../../assets/images/marvel-logo.png';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faArrowLeft}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Header=function Header(){var headerRef=useRef(null);var location=useLocation();var navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(function(){var shrinkHeader=function shrinkHeader(){if(document.body.scrollTop>100||document.documentElement.scrollTop>100){headerRef.current.classList.add('shrink');}else{headerRef.current.classList.remove('shrink');}};window.addEventListener('scroll',shrinkHeader);return function(){window.removeEventListener('scroll',shrinkHeader);};},[]);var isHome=location.pathname==='/';return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{ref:headerRef,className:"header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header__container",children:[isHome?"":/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:"btn_back_header",className:"btn header__btn header__btn-back",onClick:function onClick(){return navigate(-1);},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faArrowLeft})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:""})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"API"})]})})]})});};export default Header;
